mapper.insert: insert into noel_marketer(MARKETER_ID, MARKETER_PW, MARKETER_NAME, MARKETER_TEL, MARKETER_EMAIL) values( #{marketerId}, #{marketerPw}, #{marketerName}, #{marketerTel},#{marketerEmail})
mapper.select: select marketer_id as marketerId, marketer_pw as marketerPw, marketer_name as marketerName, marketer_tel as marketerTel, MARKETER_REGDATE as marketerRegdate, marketer_level as marketerLevel, marketer_email as marketerEmail, MARKETER_AUTH as marketerAuth from noel_marketer where marketer_id=#{marketerId}

select marketer_id as marketerId, marketer_pw as marketerPw, marketer_name as marketerName, marketer_tel as marketerTel, marketer_regdate as marketer_Regdate, marketer_level as marketerLevel, marketer_email as marketerEmail, marketer_auth as marketerAuth from(select rownum as rnum, n.* from (select * from noel_marketer) n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select marketer_id as marketerId from noel_marketer where marketer_name = #{marketerName} and marketer_tel = #{marketerTel}
